snippet: A strong United States jobs report lifted the Dow Jones industrial average to just short of the 18,000 mark, though stock gains were restrained.
abstract: Strong jobs report lifts stock in United States and Europe and leaves Dow Jones industrial average just short of 18,000 mark.
lead_paragraph: A strong United States jobs report lifted the Dow Jones industrial average to just short of the 18,000 mark, though stock gains were restrained.
